visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bar chart displaying the top 10 EU countries in organic farming area for the year 2018. The chart should have a title 'Top 10 EU countries in organic farming area (2018)' and a subtitle with a source link to Eurostat. The x-axis should list the countries, and the y-axis should display the percentage of organic farming area, ranging from 0 to 30% with a tick interval of 10. The bars should have data labels showing the percentage, and the tooltip should display the percentage with a suffix. The chart should have a zooming feature on the y-axis, and the legend should be disabled. The bar color should be '#a5d6a7' with a border color of '#60A465'.

title.text: Top 10 EU countries in organic farming area (2018)

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a bar chart that visualizes the top 10 EU countries in terms of organic farming area for the year 2018. The chart is titled 'Top 10 EU countries in organic farming area (2018)' and includes a subtitle with a hyperlink to the Eurostat source. The x-axis lists the countries, while the y-axis displays the percentage of organic farming area, ranging from 0 to 30% with a tick interval of 10. Each bar in the chart is labeled with its corresponding percentage, and the tooltip displays the percentage value when hovered over. The chart includes a zooming feature specifically on the y-axis, allowing users to zoom in on the vertical data. The legend is disabled, and the bars are colored '#a5d6a7' with a border color of '#60A465'. This configuration ensures a clear and accessible visualization of the data.
